alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Hall; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 11:29PM CDT until August 09 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Adams County in south central Nebraska... Central Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Cairo to near Gibbon to 8 miles southwest of Odessa, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Gibbon, Shelton and Cairo around 1135 PM CDT. Wood River around 1140 PM CDT. Kenesaw and Prosser around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Alda, Minden, Doniphan, Juniata, Grand Island, Hastings, Hansen, Heartwell, Norman and Holstein. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 317. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
